attributes.comment:
Dear USICS

We are an adoptive family with one child, and in the process for the adoption of
our second child.

We are asking that you please do not increase the fees for adoption.

Adoption expenses are a financial burden for so many adoptive families. We
make many financial sacrifices to be able to afford adoption. We are happy to
make the necessary sacrifices to have the reward of a family through adoption.
The current fees for adoption are a struggle for us and many adoptive families we
know. An increase in fees would be a financial burden that we hope not to have to
manage.

Please consider that many families already struggle with the expenses they incur
so that they may have the blessing of having a family through adoption.

Please do not raise the fees for adoption.

Thank you!

Sincerely,

Holly Krupinski
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Holly Krupinski
